titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a permanent extension of the exclusion for educational assistance programs.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the income tax exclusion for employee educational assistance programs. (Present law terminates such exclusion as of December 31, 1987.)
